title: Pics: The 297 Antiquities US Handed Over To India During PM Modi's Visit
content: The US has handed over to India 297 antiquities during the visit of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. These antiquities were smuggled out of the country and were recovered.
summary: The US has handed over to India 297 antiquities during the visit of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. These antiquities were smuggled out of the country and were recovered.

title: PM To Address Huge Gathering Of Indian Community In US Today: 10 Points
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will meet the Indian diaspora at the Nassau Coliseum in New York today. Hours earlier, he attended the Quad Summit, where he put forward India's views and commitments for global growth, development, peace and security.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will meet the Indian diaspora at the Nassau Coliseum in New York today. Hours earlier, he attended the Quad Summit, where he put forward India's views and commitments for global growth, development, peace and security.

title: 7 Killed By Israeli Strike On School Compound In Gaza: Palestinian Medics
content: An Israeli airstrike killed seven people in a school sheltering displaced families in Gaza City on Sunday, Palestinian health officials said, with the Israeli military saying it had targeted militants operating from the compound.
summary: An Israeli airstrike killed seven people in a school sheltering displaced families in Gaza City on Sunday, Palestinian health officials said, with the Israeli military saying it had targeted militants operating from the compound.

title: North Korea Executes 2 Women Who Helped People Escape To South Korea
content: The women were charged with assisting other North Koreans in China to escape to South Korea.

title: India Pledges $7.5 Million To Combat Cervical Cancer In Indo-Pacific Region
content: To strengthen the fight against cervical cancer, India has pledged a grant of USD 7.5 million to the testing, screening, and diagnosis of the disease in the Indo-Pacific region.
summary: To strengthen the fight against cervical cancer, India has pledged a grant of USD 7.5 million to the testing, screening, and diagnosis of the disease in the Indo-Pacific region.

title: Flight Makes Emergency Landing After Live Mouse Found In Airplane Meal
content: Airlines usually have strict restrictions about rodents on board, since they can chew through electrical wiring.
summary: Airlines usually have strict restrictions about rodents on board, since they can chew through electrical wiring.

title: US School Shooter's Mother Charged With Taping His Grandmother To Chair

title: 5 Facts About Anura Dissanayake, Man Likely To Become Sri Lanka President

title: 51 Dead, 20 Injured In Blast Caused By Methane Gas Leak At Iran Coal Mine
content: The accident was caused by a methane gas explosion in two blocks, B and C, of the mine run by the Madanjoo company, state media said.
summary: The accident was caused by a methane gas explosion in two blocks, B and C, of the mine run by the Madanjoo company, state media said.

title: Opinion: Quad - And India's Role In It - Will Remain Relevant, Thanks To China
content: Both the Quad as a partnership and India's presence in such partnerships are expected to continue in a world where the rise of China remains a source of fragmentation in the current liberal or American world order.
summary: Both the Quad as a partnership and India's presence in such partnerships are expected to continue in a world where the rise of China remains a source of fragmentation in the current liberal or American world order.

title: Silver Coins, Bibles, Sneakers: How Donald Trump Is Cashing On Merchandise
content: Recent federal filings reveal that Trump's fundraising efforts lag behind those of his Democratic opponent, Vice President Kamala Harris, who raised a staggering $190 million in August, compared to Trump's $45 million during the same period.
summary: Recent federal filings reveal that Trump's fundraising efforts lag behind those of his Democratic opponent, Vice President Kamala Harris, who raised a staggering $190 million in August, compared to Trump's $45 million during the same period.

title: Former Iran Military Unit Chief, Notorious For Assassination Plots, Dies

title: Security Council To Space Tech: Key Takeaways From Modi-Biden Meet In US
content: US President Joe Biden commended Prime Minister Narendra Modi for his historic visit to Ukraine and his message of peace amid the war with Russia. The US also backed permanent membership for India in the UN Security Council.
